topic.title: Same file different versions
topic.shortdesc: This concept template uses monikers. That way, concepts can be in one place for all versions. If the same content applies to several versions, you designate the section with an operator preceding the version such as >, <, >=, <=. In other words, it isn't necessary to write the same thing over again and put it within a different moniker set. Just add the operator to the range value.
